subdefinitions.definition: A word, phrase or line supplied by a prompter to an actor who has forgotten the script .
A suggestion for inspiration given to an author.

definitions.definition: A time limit given for payment of an account for produce purchased, this limit varying with different goods.
A sequence of characters that is displayed to indicate that a computer is ready to receive input.
examples: I filled in my name where the prompt appeared on the computer screen but my account wasn't recognized.

definitions.definition: Textual input given to a large language model or image model in order to have it generate a desired output.

secondary_definitions: ( business , dated ) A time limit given for payment of an account for produce purchased, this limit varying with different goods.
( computing ) A sequence of characters that is displayed to indicate that a computer is ready to receive input.
( machine learning ) Textual input given to a large language model or image model in order to have it generate a desired output.
